description: This allows your customer to pay via a NIP (NIBBS Instant Payment) transfer.

spec.tx_ref: Required: This is a unique reference, unique to the particular transaction being carried out. It is generated by the merchant for every transaction.
spec.amount: Required: This is the amount to be charged it is passed as - (“amount”:10). Minimum amount for GHS is 1 GHS
spec.fullname: Should include first and last name of the customer
spec.email: Required: This is the email address of the customer.
spec.phone_number: This is the phone number linked to the customer's mobile money account.
spec.subaccounts: This is an array of objects containing the subaccount IDs to split the payment into.
spec.client_ip: IP - Internet Protocol. This represents the current IP address of the customer carrying out the transaction.
spec.device_fingerprint: This is the fingerprint for the device being used. It can be generated using a library on whatever platform is being used.
spec.currency: Required: This is the specified currency to charge in.
spec.duration: This is represented in days e.g. passing 2 means 2 days. It is the expiry date for the account number. Setting to 2 would mean you want the account number to exist for 2 days before expiring.
spec.frequency: This is the number of times a generated account number can receive payments. Represented as an Integer e.g. 'frequency': 10 means the account can receive payments up to 10 times before expiring.
spec.narration: This allows the developer set the name that is shown to the customer when the account is resolved to a name. It also displays in the debit narration.
spec.is_permanent: This allows you create a static account number i.e. the account number doesn't change and customers can pay into the account number multiple times.
spec.meta: This is to include additional payment information

sample_request.narration: All star college salary for May

authorization.transfer_note: Please make a bank transfer to Yemi Desola
